titleStmt.title: The Observator in a delemma, that while he justifies the Lord Mayor and his aldermen, he reflects on Mr. Box, and while he vindicates Mr. Box, he pleads the protectors cause against the Lord Mayor and his aldermen

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Wing numbers O104-O123 are repeated on p. 500-501 in the original bibliography.
Wing O109 is listed as O123F in the revised edition, of the bibliography.
This item can be found at reels 770:12 and 1022:13.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
